description: This file contains the interface definitions for the IIPNetwork and its nested IDNSServers within the WPEFramework project. It declares virtual methods for managing network addresses and DNS servers.

classes.name: IIPNetwork
classes.description: An interface for managing IP network configurations, including adding/removing addresses and DNS servers.

classes.name: IDNSServers
classes.description: An interface for iterating over DNS server entries, with methods to reset, move to next, and retrieve server info.

methods.name: AddAddress
methods.description: Adds an IP address to a specified network interface, with overloads for additional parameters.

methods.name: RemoveAddress
methods.description: Removes an IP address configuration from a specified network interface.

methods.name: AddDNS
methods.description: Adds DNS server entries to the network configuration.

methods.name: RemoveDNS
methods.description: Removes DNS server entries from the network configuration.

methods.name: Reset
methods.description: Resets the DNS servers enumeration to the beginning.

methods.name: Next
methods.description: Advances to the next DNS server in the list.

methods.name: Server
methods.description: Returns the DNS server's address as a string.

ctags.name: IDNSServers
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IDNSServers : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IIPNetwork
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IIPNetwork : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
